item.title: Detecting and splitting scenes in a video
item.description: When editing videos for my YouTube channel, Learn Data with Mark, I spend a bunch of time each week chopping up a screencast into scenes that I then line up with a separately recorded voice-over. I was curious whether I could automate the chopping-up process and that’s what we’re going to explore in this video. I started out by asking ChatGPT the following question: ChatGPT Prompt I want to chop up a demo for a YouTube video into smaller segments.
